attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
1. Sanctions against Zimbabwe must not be lifted or eased by the UN and EU

2. Britain must place more pressure on President ZUMA of South Africa to force Mugabe and ZANU PF to uphold the Coalition Government Agreement

3. Britain must lobby the UN and EU to put pressure on SADC to force ZANU PF to rescind it’s Indigenization programme which is enshrined in racism

4. The travel ban against Mugabe be tightened further through the UN and EU.
